task.title: Create a Scheduled Facebook Post
task.shortdesc: Knowing how to schedule Facebook posts helps you save time creating individual posts, provide consistent content for your followers, and connect and engage with more people.

taskbody.context: This function supports social media marketers constantly trying to keep up with posting schedules.

step.cmd: Go to the top of your Facebook page’s timeline. There you will see the box where you can create a post.
Once you’ve created a post, go to the drop down button next to Publish and select Schedule. That will bring you to a window that’ll allow you to select a time you want your post to go up.
Now select the date and time you want your Facebook post to post.
